decoworld.server

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • decoworld.server.UserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class UserManager
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    Class for general user management. Creating users, deleting users, updating details etc.

      • createUser

        public static decoworld.model.User createUser(java.util.UUID id,
                              java.lang.String displayName)
                                       throws javax.persistence.RollbackException
        Attempts to create a new user from the provided details. If it succeeds and the User schema is adhered too then it returns the newly created user. NOTE: the new user is also added to the database! If it fails to create/add the user, the entityManager is reset and RollbackException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id -
        displayName -
        Returns:
        new User
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.RollbackException
